mapper.select: select f.id as id, f.project_id as projectId, f.epic as epic, f.report_to as reportTo, f.feature_status as status, f.version as version, f.description as description, f.close_date as closeDate, f.author_name as authorName, f.create_time as createTime, f.title as title, f.update_time as updateTime, f.moudle as moudle from feature f where f.id=#{id} and f.user_id = #{masterId}

select f.id as id, f.title as title from feature f join test_case tc on tc.feature = f.id join test_cycle_join_test_case tcjtc on tc.id = tcjtc.test_case_id where tcjtc.test_cycle_id = #{testCycleId};
mapper.update:
update feature
epic = #{epic},
report_to = #{reportTo},
status = #{status},
version = #{version},
description = #{description},
close_date = #{closeDate},
author_name = #{authorName},
title = #{title},
moudle = #{moudle},
update_time=NOW()
where id = #{id}
